  2. Turn on the Microphone access and Let apps access your microphone options. You can scroll down and manage the microphone access to a specific app.

Fix 3: Enable the microphone for recording

  1. On the taskbar, right-click thespeaker icon and selectSound settings .
  2. Scroll down and clickMore sound settings .
  3. Under theRecording tab , enable your microphone. If you can’t find it, right-click anywhere empty and selectShow Disabled devices .
